message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value of similar products, but I still believe my product has unique features that justify a higher price. Considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,500. I think this is a reasonable compromise that still reflects the value I'm looking for.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm willing to pay $9,750. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a balance between the market value and the value you'll get from the product. However, I still believe my product has unique features that are worth more than your latest offer. Considering your persistence, I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $10,200. I think this is a fair compromise that reflects the value I'm looking for.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make concessions. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,900, which is my final offer. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,900. Considering the value I've already conceded, I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $10,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
